values: $username, for your $plantype account with mobile number $phonenumber, the last payment was made on $last_payment_date for an amount of Rs. $last_payment_amt.
$username, I don't see any payment made to your account. recharge amt = $rechargeamt and date = $recharge_date. You are a $plantype user.
$username, your last recharge amount was for $rechargeamt made on $recharge_date.
Goto Settings - More - Mobile/Cellular Network - Preferred Network Type/Mode - Select WCDMA or GSM only
Request you please share me the handset name and model.
We have pushed Internet settings to your @phone-make handset. You will receive it immediately.

On your @phone-make phone, do the following:

1: Tap on Applications icon.
2: Tap on Settings icon.
3: Tap on More.
4: Tap on Mobile networks.
5: Tap on SIM 1 or SIM 2 tab.
6: Tap on Preferred network type.
7: Tap on WCDMA
8: Tap on Back.
9: Tap on Back.
10: Tap on Back.
11: Tap on Back.
$username, as you are a prepaid user, bill is not generated.
Your bill has been generated on $stmtdate for an amount of $dueamt and due to be paid latest by $payment_due_date.
I don't have your account details to get you your bill.
$username, as a prepaid user bill is not generated.
$username your current bill due amount is $dueamt.
Please enable Mobile Data and it should work.

Let us try this.
Go to Settings->More->Mobile Network -> Access Point Names.
Then select Vodafone Connect/Vodafone Mobile Connect -> WCDMA/3G.
After that either restart the phone or turn Airplane mode on and off.
Do you have Mobile Data enabled on your phone settings?

Then the data should work fine. Please try restarting the phone.

If that doesn't work either, then please place the sim in another phone and try accessing data.

I can help you with that.
Do you see an E or H beside the network bars on your phone screen?

You need to clear your Outstanding i.e. Billed amount + Prorated rental with service tax on the total amount, payment should only be made in cash, If there is a security deposit on your account you will receive it in 60 days after adjusting the outstanding if any at your registered billing address via cheque. Please visit your nearest Vodafone store along with the following: 1 recent passport size photograph, a copy of photo ID proof like pan card, passport, etc & proof of address like passport, adhaar card,etc. I would also request you to carry the above copy of documents along with their originals for spot verification. Carry the old SIM card and the charges for a new Pre paid SIM card  Once you receive the new SIM card, please note It will be partially activated within 24 hour. After partial activation, please call 59059 (toll free) for televerification. On successful completion of televerification, your number will be activated within in 15 minutes If the Tele-Verification not done within 30 days then the number will be disconnected
$username, I can help you change your plan type to prepaid.

Please select it & then restart your handset.

That should solve your problem.
Extremely sorry, it seems like in your area there is no 3G service.

Our sincere apologies for the mistake. I can help guide you to get it rectified.

As a name change requires identity proof, we are unable to process it online. But, you can visit your nearest Vodafone store along with your Proof of Identity(both photo copy and the original) and they can process the request for Name correction.

As a name change requires identity proof, we are unable to process it online.  But, you can visit your nearest Vodafone store along with your Proof of Identity(both a photo copy and an original) and they can process the request for Name correction.

Our sincere apologies for the mistake. As a name change requires identity proof, we are unable to process it online.  But, you can visit your nearest Vodafone store along with your Proof of Identity(both photo copy and the original) and they can process the request for Name correction.
Bye $username.
You are most welcome $username. Bye for now.
You are most welcome $username. Please let me know if I can further assist you.

output.text: Ok, I've got your details. Let's get started.

values: Hmmm... you are already in a prepaid plan. What am I missing?
$username, I can help you changing your plan type from prepaid to postpaid.
I am glad to inform that the address will be changed in 24 hours of application submission.  You will also receive a SMS communication, post successful address Change.

You can pay at:
1. a Vodafone store.
2. Online
3. Via the Vodafone mobile app

You can recharge the account:
1. At a Vodafone store.
2. Online
3. Via the Vodafone mobile app

You can make the bill payment:
1. At a Vodafone store.
2. Online
3. Via the Vodafone mobile app

I'm really sorry you are having this problem, let me check if there is anything I can do to help you.

Please go to network settings on your phone and then search network manually once. Please let me know what Vodafone networks you see.
Your account status is $conn_status.

I can help you with that, $username.
Your current email ID is $email.

To change it, please send an SMS from your registered mobile number: â€œEmail new_email_Idâ€ to 199 (Toll Free). It will be updated within 15 minutes
Individual password will be combination of the first 4 letters of name (as you registered it with Vodafone) and the last 4 digits of Vodafone primary number

1. Kindly remove and reinsert the SIM. Go to settings and ensure your default APN is "www" or "vodafonemobileconnect" 2. Select Network operator manually: Goto Settings - More - Mobile/Cellular Network - Network operator - Select network manually as "Vodafone IN". 3. Select Network mode as GSM(3G) only: Goto settings - More - Mobile/Cellular Network - Preferred Network type/mode - select GSM only or 3G only.

I can help you with that. Can you please let me know the device you are using?

You can also get the internet settings by sending sms ALL to 199 (Toll Free).

$username, to change your registered billing address, request you to send an email to Vodafone care vodafonecare.$circlecode@ vodafone.com from your registered email address.

Please attach self-attested scanned copies of photo ID proof like
1. PAN card,
2. Passport,
3. Aadhar card, etc. and proof of New address like
1. Passport,
2. Aadhaar card,
3. Bank Statement, etc.

Physical verification will be done on new address.
I am sorry to hear that.  I will surely help you.
Your PUK code is $puk.
Please send an SMS to 199 (toll-free) with message DUPBILL <First three letters of the month>, and you will receive the e-bill on your registered email address within 30 mins.
Please send an SMS to 199 (toll-free) to get bill to your registered email : DUPBILL<space>first 3 letters of month.
